products.title: Small Cutting Board
products.summary: 8” x 12” x ¾” thick cutting board
features: All of our boards are handmade in our shop using hand selected, locally purchased domestic and exotic hardwoods, never endangered or protected species. This cutting board is made with Walnut, Maple, Cherry and Mahogany and is 100% food safe.

The colors you see? That is simply nature’s beauty. We do not use stains or dyes and only high quality wood safe glues. Our boards are finished with food grade mineral oil which penetrates and protects the wood grain, as well as brings out the natural luster and beauty of each species of wood. Finally a coat of food grade finishing oil is applied to further protect the wood.
Each of our items are handmade so the exact grain pattern in the wood may vary from the one pictured. Photos are for style reference and may not exactly match the piece you'll receive.
These boards are typically made to order and will take between 5-10 days to ship.

products.title: Large End-Grain Cutting Board
products.summary: 12” x 18” x 1 3/4” thick end-grain cutting board
features: Elevate your kitchen with our premium End Grain butcher block cutting boards. All of our boards are handmade in our shop using hand selected, locally purchased domestic hardwoods. Your End Grain cutting board can be made with either Walnut, Maple, or Cherry. And of course it is 100% food safe.

Each edge of the board is finished with a 1/4" chamfer edge and grooved handles on either side for easy lifting. You may choose to add non-slip cutting board feet and/or a juice groove to help when carving meats. The board feet consist of an outer wooden ring and an inner polyurethane non-slip bumper.

Construction: End grain construction rotates the wood so you are cutting into the grain from the ends of the timber. This process is more difficult and takes more time, but the results are fantastic. Structurally stronger and better looking, the increased price is well worth the investment.

The colors you see? That is simply nature’s beauty. We do not use stains or dyes and only high quality wood safe glues. Our boards are finished with food grade mineral oil which penetrates and protects the wood grain, as well as brings out the natural luster and beauty of each species of wood. Finally a coat of food grade finishing oil is applied to further protect the wood.
Each of our items are handmade so the exact grain pattern in the wood may vary from the one pictured. Photos are for style reference and may not exactly match the piece you'll receive.
Each board is made to order and typically has a 1-2 week delivery time.
